description.en-US: This is a repository of iodéOS apps to be used with F-Droid.

summary.en-US: Redistribution of official versions of FakeStore for iodeOS
Our own channel for distributing the official Aurora Store

summary.en: Redistribution of official versions of microG for iodeOS
summary.fr: Redistribution des versions officielles de microG pour iodéOS

metadata.authorName: iodé Team (forked from official LineageOS Aperture)

summary.en-US: iodéOS version of LineageOS Aperture new camera app

description.en-US: Aperture is the official camera app of LineageOS. We distribute it here, with auxiliary cameras enabled. We also added the possibility to delete photos from the gallery when opened from preview.

summary.en-US: Browser based on Mozilla Firefox, with alternative default search engine and no telemetry

description.en-US:
This Firefox fork has the following features:

* Telemetry disabled and its corresponding code partially removed (trackers Adjust, BreadCrumb, Google AdMob, LeanPlum).
* Alternative search engine: Qwant is is the default search engine.
* Several search engines added: Brave, Ecosia, Gibiru, Metager, Mojeek, Qwant light, Startpage, several Searx instances, Swisscows, You.com.
* Qwant replaces Google in the hard-coded top sites.
* Several menu entries removed: Telemetry, USB debugging, Vote on Google Play.

metadata.authorName: iodé Team (forked from official LineageOS Jelly)

summary.en-US: iodéOS version of LineageOS browser, with alternative search engines

description.en-US: Jelly is the official browser of LineageOS. We tweaked it to set Qwant as the default search engine and suggestions provider, and added several alternative search engines (Brave, DuckDuckGo, Ecosia, Gibiru, Metager, Mojeek, several Searx instances, Startpage, Swisscows, You.com).

metadata.authorName: iodé Team (forked from official Open Camera)

summary.en-US: iodéOS version of Open Camera with a few tweaks
Our own channel for distributing the official Breezy Weather

description.en-US: Distribution of the official app, standard version.
Small adaptations of HeliBoard by Helium314.

We forked FDroid in order to give the iodé repository a higher priority
than prebuilt repos, and to reset the repos database if needed (particularly,
for already running instances of the iodéOS ROM).
